author: Staff Reporter
text: Unidentified burglars broke into a house in Oddanchatram near here and took away 50 sovereigns of gold jewels and Rs. 30,000 kept in an almirah on Monday night. Police said that the burglars broke open the back door of the house of Ramani in ward 14 when the family members had gone to Palani to attend Sivaratri festival. When they reached home on Monday morning, they found the jewels and cash missing. Fingerprint experts lifted samples from the house. The police have registered a case in this connection.
title: Jewels, cash stolen
